name: I Don't Want You
description:
To my future son: I Don't Want You. This game tells the story of a man who would never want a child. 

This game was created for the I Can't Write But I Want To Tell A Story Game Jam.  It is a simple narration game with dialogue you read. The theme of this Jam was "Lost". I decided to incorporate this theme bu telling the story of a father lost and confused on parenting, going as far as not wanting to be a father.

I used this experience to create a dialogue system for myself. I'll be able to use this dialogue system in any future games now. I also worked a lot with Audacity and sound editing. This was my first time recording and editing audio.

CREDITS:

Game, art,  and story made by me.

Music by Charteeguh on Soundcloud (https://soundcloud.com/charteeguh?ref=clipboard).
